group_1.textLeft: You and the king of Kuna were gonna abandon everything?

group_1.textRight: L-like...an elopement?@What happened...?
...In those days, our war with Kuna raged@even more violently than it does now.
The endless strife had us all exhausted...

group_1.narration: "At first, my interactions@with Kukuchihiko were done@in order to secure the peace treaty...@But over time, I became drawn@to his personality..."
"...Well, I won't go into all the details."
"Eventually, one day,@I felt like I'd had enough of everything,@and wanted to escape from this world@together with Kukuchihiko..."
"And Kukuchihiko told me he felt likewise."
"Alas...just as we were about to escape,@the sea abruptly turned berserk…@to the point we couldn't launch our ship."
"I believe the gods were punishing us@for our reckless misconduct."
"In our distress,@pursuers from Kuna and@Yamatai closed in on us...@And we were separated."
"Our foolish escapade ended there...@And I never saw Kukuchihiko again."

group_1.textCenter: ...Shortly after that,@I learned I was pregnant with Toyo.
I could at least let her be free…
I wanted her to live a life without politics@and war.
...I didn't want her to be like me.
That's why I sent her to live as a stranger.
Were her birth to be revealed, she would@inevitably become a political pawn…
I knew that would have forced her through@so much pain.

group_1.textLeft: But...Kuna knows about Toyo?

group_1.textRight: ...I believe it was my brother@who informed them.
I think he plots to manipulate Kuna...
...But he will be powerless against Kukuchihiko's@father.

group_1.textLeft: His dad?

group_1.textRight: He is the true ruler of Kuna.
Kukuchihiko himself is also a pawn of politics.
...And he is doubtlessly pursuing Toyo.

group_1.textLeft: So considering how Toyo's been getting targeted@by Kuna...
Is that because the king's dad wanted his granddaughter back?

group_1.textRight: I suppose...but he wants her returned to him@as a tool.

group_1.textLeft: A tool…

group_1.textRight: I am not immortal.@I will die someday.
My brother will succeed me,@but he will not last long.
And then my only successor will be Toyo...
What's more, Toyo is also one of Kuna's@successors.

group_1.narration: "If Toyo becomes the queen of both lands,@and Kukuchihiko's father manipulates her@from behind the scenes, then..."
"It would be as if Yamatai@had been absorbed into Kuna."

group_1.textRight: ...That is surely the aim of that man.
Meanwhile, my thoughtless brother wants@the same situation in reverse…

group_1.textLeft: So no matter what you do, Toyo's caught@right in the middle of this conflict.

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's right… But Toyo…
Toyo is trying to follow in my footsteps…
…Nnh…it wasn't supposed to be this way!

group_1.narration: "I thought that if everyone around Toyo believed@she was the child of a Cursed God,@I would be able to keep her away from this,@even if it meant hurting her!"
"But even so, Kuna still began pursuing Toyo…@And before I knew it,@Toyo became a succession candidate…@working so hard to gain my approval,@despite how frail she is…!"
"And then…@Once she was placed in my hands like that…@I had no choice but to protect her…@That's what I thought… I thought…!"

group_1.textRight: …There's nothing I can do@to stem Toyo's illness…
I can't protect her with my power!
S-so please, I beg you…@Please take Toyo with you to The Future!

group_1.textLeft: Th-that's…

group_1.textRight: I know it's not possible...@But still I must ask!
Please…!@Please save my daughter!
Aren't your people capable of such?@Can't you do that in the Future? Can't you?
Rena… I beg of you…@Please save my daughter…

group_1.textLeft: …Mm…

group_1.textRight: Miss Kaede… Please…@I'll give you anything…
Hey, they're back.

group_1.textLeft: Mama…

group_1.textRight: Toyo…were you awake?

group_1.textLeft: …Is that a firefly?

group_1.textRight: Ah, yes…@I found it on our return home.
Aren't they beautiful?@I wanted you to see one.

group_1.textLeft: …Yeah, it's amazing…
Could you bring it up closer?
My hands…won't move…
Ah…
…Oh, it flew away…@I was hoping to look at it some more…

group_1.textRight: You liked it that much?

group_1.textLeft: I love the lights of fireflies.

group_1.textRight: Is that so…?@I…had no idea…
…Then next time, I'll bring you a night's sky@worth of fireflies.
Would that please you?

group_1.textLeft: Nahaha… I'm worried seeing all those fireflies@would make me sick…

group_1.textRight: It's alright, I'll clean it up.@For your happiness, I'll clean it all up.

group_1.textLeft: You could do anything for me, Mama…
I'll be happy no matter what.

group_1.textRight: …I'm sorry we couldn't take you there, Toyo…

group_1.textLeft: Huh…? You mean to the oh-shun?

group_1.textRight: Yeah… Sorry…

group_1.textLeft: But why?@It's my fault I couldn't go.
I'm sorry for being like this.

group_1.textRight: …*Sniffle…*

group_1.textLeft: Kaede…?

group_1.textRight: …Sh-she…went out to catch more fireflies,@I think…
All of us…we…we wanted to make you@happy, so…

group_1.textLeft: You guys are so kind…
Ah…I'm so happy… Even though I couldn't@get to see the oh-shun…
Mama brought me…a beautiful firefly…@Just to show me…
Everyone I love…has done so much for me…

group_1.textRight: Ah, Your Majesty… What happened?@This morning, you…

group_1.textLeft: …I need to create something that will take@all of my Spirit Arts.
I wasn't able to get much sleep…

group_1.textRight: P-please take better care of yourself, my lady!

group_1.textLeft: No need to make such a big fuss…
More importantly…I need you to tell everyone@to gather at the main shrine.
I have received the divine will…@We must spark a war against Kuna.
